summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingOak Essentials Pure Gel Cleanser is a multi-tasking cleanser that gently lifts away impurities and effectively removes makeup as Aloe Leaf Juice and Verbena Extract soothe and moisturize skin for a clean, refreshing finish.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsAloe Leaf Juice: Refreshing yet soothing, it is packed with antioxidants and antimicrobial compounds, and helps moisturize and calm dry, sensitive skin.Verbena Officinalis Extract: Derived from the leaves of a verbena plant, it is packed with nutrients and skin-soothing emollients that wonâ€™t strip skin or cause over-drying, instead softening, hydrating, and conditioning skin for a balanced moisture barrier.Glycerin: A humectant that draws moisture from the environment and locks it in for naturally supple and plump skin.Formulated WithoutMade simply and without compromise, their skincare formulas are non-GMO and organic whenever possible, and always formulated without silicones, colorants, sulfates, phthalates, parabens, PEGs, petrolatum, mineral oil, and nanoparticles.Item 2631912How To UseUse AM and PM daily. Apply 2-3 pumps to damp skin and massage using circular motions. Rinse off with water and pat skin dry. TIP: For a double cleanse, use after Cleansing Balm.Warning: For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water immediately. Do not ingest. Do not store at elevated temperatures.IngredientsWater (Aqua, Eau), Glycerin, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Lauryl Glucoside, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Sodium Lauryl Glucose Carboxylate, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Acrylates Copolymer, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Niacinamide, Sodium Phytate, Glyceryl Laurate, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Abies Balsamea (Balsam Canada) Needle Oil, Boswellia Serrata Oil, Juniperus Virginiana Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, Linalyl Acetate, Triethyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Citric Acid, Sodium Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Benzoate, Linalool.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use AM and PM daily. Apply 2-3 pumps to damp skin and massage using circular motions. Rinse off with water and pat skin dry. TIP: For a double cleanse, use after Cleansing Balm.Warning: For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water immediately. Do not ingest. Do not store at elevated temperatures.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have used many of the Oak Essentials products and loved them all with the only exception being the original cleanser. Personally, I did not find that the cleansing balm worked well for my skin and I always hoped Oak would come out with something else. This is exactly what I was looking for! It is gentle, nourishing, and doesn't leave a film on the skin but also doesn't make the skin feel dry and stripped. The bottle is also huge and a little really does go a long way. My ONLY request is that Oak Essentials includes this as an option when purchasing the routine. I would LOVE to buy the full set with this cleanser instead of the balm.
faceoff_positive.headline: Amazing cleanser!

faceoff_negative.comments: Ordered when they were selling the sheepskin slides as part of a promo. Shoes are defective and they refuse to return them. If you check the Jenni Kayne website, there are multiple complaints about the strap of sandal being so large that the shoe won't stay on. Contacted customer service and no resolution. Won't buy from here again.
faceoff_negative.headline: Sold defective sandals and won't return
